title: [Snyk] SNYK-JS-FASTXMLPARSER-15155603 in fast-xml-parser@4.4.1
description:
## Uncaught Exception

**Severity:** high
**Package:** fast-xml-parser@4.4.1
**File:** `dashboard/package.json`

**CVSS Score:** 8.7  
**Exploit Maturity:** proof-of-concept  
**Snyk Priority Score:** 756/1000

### CVEs
- [CVE-2026-25128](https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2026-25128)

**Fix:** Pin `fast-xml-parser` to version 5.3.4 or later.

### Details
## Overview
[fast-xml-parser](https://www.npmjs.org/package/fast-xml-parser) is a Validate XML, Parse XML, Build XML without C/C++ based libraries

Affected versions of this package are vulnerable to Uncaught Exception in the numeric entity processing when parsing XML containing out-of-range entity code points. An attacker can cause the application to crash by submitting specially crafted XML input that triggers an uncaught exception.
## Remediation
Upgrade `fast-xml-parser` to version 5.3.4 or higher.
## References
- [GitHub Commit](https://github.com/NaturalIntelligence/fast-xml-parser/commit/4e387f61c4a5cef792f6a2f42467013290bf95dc)
- [GitHub Release](https://github.com/NaturalIntelligence/fast-xml-parser/releases/tag/v5.3.4)


### Reference
- [Snyk advisory](https://security.snyk.io/vuln/SNYK-JS-FASTXMLPARSER-15155603)
